name: Arrivoo
description:
SYNOPSYS

You are a rider in fantastic city. Your goal is to reach the greatest number possible of delivery around the city. However, you have to pay attention: there are a lot of cars and obstacles. Every time you hit  a car you will receive a fine. The game ends when time is up or when fines reach 40. You have 100 seconds to  give you best. Enjoy!

Commands

Player movement: W

Acceleration: SHIFT

Camera view: Mouse

Pause/Esc: Space Bar

The assets

To realize the assets, we took some 3D models from:

  • Blender: https://www.blender.org/
  • Unity: https://unity.com/
  • Texture: https://3dtextures.me/
  • Substance Alchemist: https://www.substance3d.com/products/substance-alchemist/
  • Characters and animations: https://www.mixamo.com/
  • Some buildings and city's stuff: https://free3d.com/
  • Soundtrack made with https://boscaceoil.net/
Developers

Flavio Delpiano 

Chiara Ferrari 

Niccolò Vianello

Credits

Arrivoo is a University project developed for the Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino (2019-2020).
